text: Hi all.... a newbie in this HubSpot field. I am making a simple template design for a web page but I am not being able to make the responsive hamburger menu at all. can anyone provide me some guidance or at least can guide me to any resource that may help me out ? Thanks in advance !

there is this from the HubSpot Docs that should help as a good starting point: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/snippets/responsive/how-to-implement-a-fixed-top-mobile-navigation-design-manager>

Aside from that, you roll your own navigation (having full control of the markup in a custom module) by making use of the `{% menu() %}` function and using a library like <https://www.smartmenus.org/>
Thanks AJ ! I had actually gone through the HubSpot docs and tried to follow it step by step, but I am still unable to bring up the "Three-line menu" or the hamburger menu icon in the mobile view.
